name: pointy
description:
⭐ stars are being dismembered and you need to help the last remaining star clone itself and escape. Use your keyboard letters to make the stars jump over any limbs. Each time you finish a level, the number of stars you need to help escape increases.⭐

__________________________________

MY FIRST GAME JAM  for the My First Game Jam for Winter 2023 !! weak title but i'm proud i finished !! 

  • Game made in Unity with C#
  • Assets drawn in Adobe Fresco
  • BG music made in Garageband

: D
